title: This Week on The Grid: Bring Your Own Style to Iconic Locations with Special Guest John Dukes
description: In this week’s episode of The Grid, Scott teams up with travel photographer John Dukes to talk all about developing your travel photography style—especially when you’re shooting those classic, iconic spots. They chat about what makes a photographer’s style stand out, how to avoid cookie-cutter shots, and why showing your personal vision in your travel images really matters. You’ll also get a peek at some cool new classes and tips to help you grow your style and storytelling skills. So if you’ve ever wondered how to make your travel photos feel more “you,” this episode is packed with practical tips, creative ideas, and plenty of laughs.
